title: Encyclopaedia Judaica -  (2007, PDF) People - Culture - History
description:
The &#039;Encyclopaedia Judaica&#039; consists of 22 PDF files 
and somewhere in the area of 15,000 pages. It is a 
good reference for most things if you want a quick 
brief on Jewish topics. 
Each article ends with a bibliographical note (further 
reading references like books or other sources). 
The text of a volume can be searched with the search 
option in Acrobat Reader.
